scripts.build:firefox: rimraf build/firefox;mkdirp build/firefox;cp -a browsers/firefox/. build/firefox/;cp -a src/. build/firefox/;zip -vr build/a11y-twitter-firefox.zip build/firefox/ -x "*.DS_Store"
scripts.build:chrome: rimraf build/chrome;mkdirp build/chrome;cp -a browsers/chrome/. build/chrome/;cp -a src/. build/chrome/;zip -vr build/a11y-twitter-chrome.zip build/chrome/ -x "*.DS_Store"
scripts.build:edge: rimraf build/edge;mkdirp build/edge;cp -a browsers/edge/. build/edge/;cp -a src/. build/edge/;zip -vr build/a11y-twitter-edge.zip build/edge/ -x "*.DS_Store"
